original_text: And she gave birth to her firstborn son and wrapped him in swaddling cloths and laid him in a manger, because there was no place for them in the inn.
korean_text: 첫아들을 낳아 강보로 싸서 구유에 뉘었으니 이는 여관에 있을 곳이 없음이러라

sentences.original_text: And she gave birth to her firstborn son
and wrapped him in swaddling cloths
and laid him in a manger
because there was no place for them in the inn
sentences.korean_translation: 여관에 그들을 위한 자리가 없었기 때문입니다
